name: Switch-Dash-Blade
description:
Kill all the enemies on the level to proceed to the next.

Every ~20s you are given a new weapon to fight with!

Potions:

  • Red heals you
  • Green gives you a speed boost
  • Blue increase the damage you deal

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • LMB for a regular attack
  • RMB for a swing attack
  • E to interact

Feedback:

Tell us how to make our game better!

  • Bug Reports: https://forms.gle/i6mQXsdBA5Kjgdmq6
  • Gameplay Feedback: https://forms.gle/uf8U5mDbxxW9DMZu6
